rows.name: Early Add

block1_text.eng:
* 2 + 3; 2 + 1; 2 + 6; 2 + 12
these are "2 more" if switched * 3 + 2; 3 + 3; 3 + 4; 3 + 8; 3 + 12
Counting On for 3 + 12 is a bit much, but it is easy if it is seen as 12 + 3 * 5 + 2: 5 + 5; 6 + 5; 5 + 9; 5 + 14
adding 5 by Counting On can be easy * 4 + 3; 14 + 3; 3 + 2; 13 + 2; 13 + 12
adding 10 * 3 + 3; 6 + 6; 13 + 13; 16 + 16; 23 + 23
doubling & 10s

rows.block1_text:
* 2 + 3; 2 + 1; 2 + 6; 2 + 12
these are "2 more" if switched * 3 + 2; 3 + 3; 3 + 4; 3 + 8; 3 + 12
Counting On for 3 + 12 is a bit much, but it is easy if it is seen as 12 + 3 * 5 + 2: 5 + 5; 6 + 5; 5 + 9; 5 + 14
adding 5 by Counting On can be easy * 4 + 3; 14 + 3; 3 + 2; 13 + 2; 13 + 12
adding 10 * 3 + 3; 6 + 6; 13 + 13; 16 + 16; 23 + 23
doubling & 10s

rows.name: Early Subtract

block1_text.eng:
* 7 - 5; 6 - 4; 9 - 4; 12 - 7
the last two can be done as 10 - 5 using compensation * 8 - 7; 9 - 6; 10 - 5; 11 - 4; 12 - 3
each changes by 1 – result changes by 2 * 8 - 5; 9 - 2; 18 - 5; 18 - 15; 19 - 2
adjusting by 10s * 7 - 3; 17 - 3; 17 - 13; 27 - 13; 27 - 23
adjusting by 10s

rows.block1_text:
* 7 - 5; 6 - 4; 9 - 4; 12 - 7
the last two can be done as 10 - 5 using compensation * 8 - 7; 9 - 6; 10 - 5; 11 - 4; 12 - 3
each changes by 1 – result changes by 2 * 8 - 5; 9 - 2; 18 - 5; 18 - 15; 19 - 2
adjusting by 10s * 7 - 3; 17 - 3; 17 - 13; 27 - 13; 27 - 23
adjusting by 10s
